name: MPSCNNBinaryConvolutionType
desc: Options that defines what operations are used to perform binary convolution.

items.name: case AND
items.desc: A convolution type that uses input image binarization and the AND-operation.

items.name: case XNOR
items.desc: A convolution type that uses input image binarization and the XNOR-operation.

items.name: case binaryWeights
items.desc: A convolution type that operates as a normal convolution, except that the weights are binary values.
